overview: As Chief Executive Officer (CEO) for Weemba, Annette Gallagher oversees the company’s growth and expansion in the United States. Annette has more than 20 years of writing experience and more than 15 years in marketing and public relations. As a natural leader with a flair for communication, Annette oversees and develops all aspects of the user experience and is responsible for all of Weemba’s content, as well as being responsible for marketing and public relations. Having worked and lived in several geographic regions of the U.S., she possesses a unique understanding of what is needed for Weemba to become a major player in the U.S. financial marketplace.
